chapters.title: Chapter 41: A Threat
chapters.info: Dorindha, p. 535 (751)—Wife of Bael. Melaine requested the other Wise Ones to ask her if she would accept Melaine as a sister-wife; she accepted, and Bael then had little choice but to marry Melaine as well. She has borne Bael three sons, but she and Melaine both know he would like a daughter. See also Bael; Melaine.
